content: all yarn tails inside go through the back loop of the top shell and the 2 loops of the body before closing off fill the fiber inside @thepetitatelier m decriem - marjorie decriem@gmail com if you re using this pattern or take advantage of one of our workshops please consider making a donation for bayview village turtle stewards at https //www tiing co/the-petit-atelier-turle-for-a-cause/ or scan qr code
